entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: Zacharias Smith is mentioned as a person who was not informed about the meeting and is now disgruntled. He is described as saying 'We're not doing anything new?' in a dis-gruntled whisper loud enough to carry through the room.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as a person who said 'We're all really sorry Harry didn't tell you, then' in a loud voice. Several people sniggered after this.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who did not inform Zacharias Smith about the meeting and is now trying to make up for it. He suggests practicing in pairs, starting with the Impediment Jinx.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as a person who is laughing along with others and making Harry feel a familiar swooping sensation in his stomach.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as the person who partners with Harry for practicing the Impediment Jinx.

relationships.description: Harry did not inform Zacharias Smith about the meeting, which led to Zacharias' disgruntlement.
Fred apologized on behalf of Harry for not informing Zacharias Smith about the meeting.
Harry and Neville partnered up to practice the Impediment Jinx together.
